newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Commerce Asset unit in Zimbabwe offering.
newsitem.headline: Commerce Asset unit in Zimbabwe offering.

text.p: Malaysia's Commerce International Merchant Bankers Bhd (CIMB) said it will co-manage a stock offering by a Zimbabwean retail and hotel company.

In a statement sent to the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange late on Tuesday, CIMB said it will co-manage the public stock offering of 51.44 million new shares of Meikles Africa Ltd at an offer price of $1.32 a share.
CIMB, a unit of Commerce Asset-Holding Bhd, said the shares will be quoted on the London Stock Exchange's SEAQ International System effective October 31, 1996.
The merchant banking firm said its participation in the offering is in line with its intention "to increase its involvement in the international capital markets."
